reasoning_bullet_points: Sector contagion from Oracle/Broadcom earnings has triggered a risk-off rotation in AI infrastructure stocks.
Major institutional divestment (Clearfield Capital -86%) and insider selling undermine immediate bullish conviction.
Technical breakdown below SMA50 ($29.83) with RSI (39) indicating room for further downside before oversold conditions are met.
Price is approaching critical support at SMA100 ($23.43); entering before a confirmed bounce at this level is premature.
